1.content:
First choice it's a hard one people.



Male
Or female
1.title: First choice

info.brief_description: You pick your body, make your dream body. Nothing stupid or I will delete it.
info.description: Ok well this is my first story. I think everyone will like it. No stupid stuff like she grew bat wings and fangs. If I feel that the chapter is dumb or you leave only one choice i will either add a choice or just delete it. Thank you and have a good time.
